title: Trump announces he will send national guard to Memphis, with Chicago ‘probably next’ – live
summary: The US president announced a new deployment plan that resembles previous actions taken in Washington DC. St. Louis has been added to the list of cities affected by this deployment. The move aims to address ongoing concerns related to security and public safety.

title: Trump to send national guard to Memphis and says Chicago is ‘probably next’
summary: The administration is intensifying efforts to address urban crime in cities led by Democratic officials by expanding military involvement. This initiative reflects a broader strategy to enhance security measures in urban areas. Critics may see this approach as controversial amid ongoing debates about policing and public safety.

title: Reeves to host bosses of UK and US financial firms as Trump visit begins
summary: The Chancellor is holding talks at Downing Street with the Treasury Secretary to discuss strategies for attracting increased investment from the United States. The discussions aim to strengthen economic ties and promote bilateral investment opportunities. The meeting underscores the UK's efforts to enhance its financial collaboration with the US.

title: Gulf leaders call on Trump to rein in Israel after Qatar emergency summit
summary: Arab states are urging the U.S. to leverage its influence to support regional stability. They have committed to enhancing their joint defense mechanisms in response to escalating tensions. The cooperation aims to strengthen security collaboration among Arab nations.
